attributes.action: allow continuing students to be entitled to the maintence grant presently only available to the 2008 cohort.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is grossly unfair that students who signed up for courses prior to September 2007 were only entitled to a maintence grant if the household income was £39,000 but students signing up for courses for September 2008 qualify for maintenance grants if the household income does not excede £60,006.  The Government wants to 'entice' more students to uni but is not intersted in helping support a large number of students already at uni and their parents many of whom are under a lot of financial pressure to assist their children because the allocated student loans are not sufficient to cover both living costs and rent while living away from home.
